media.name: Get Plugged In
media.caption: This is an unofficial poster for the IUPUI New Media program. The cord leads the viewer to read a small description of the program.

media.name: Smoking Man
media.caption: This is cartoon illustration in a mosaic-style. The blocky shapes where outlined quickly to better simulate randomness.

media.name: The Interpretation of Dreams
media.caption: The book cover is a rendition of Pharaoh's dream interpreted by Joseph from the Bible (Genesis 41:5-7).

media.name: Jack O'Lantern
media.caption: Darth Vader is cut out of a pumpkin in honor of Halloween.

media.name: Checkers
media.caption: This piece stresses perspective and a simple color scheme. The red of the checkers moves the viewer's eyes to the King, subtly showing it is in perfect position to destroy the black checkers.

media.name: History of Nintendo
media.caption: Show your Sony pride by declaring "Nintendo is History", since they have no comeback to the PSP. In retrospect, I was very wrong.
